Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義 2. 電壓降與停電 3. 電壓不平衡 4. 電力諧波 5. 頻率變動 6. 電壓閃爍 7. 暫態過壓 8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與 Z - 轉換 2. 取樣原理 3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換 4. 數位濾波器系統設計 5. 同位訊號處理 6. 時變訊號處理 - 短時域傅式轉換 7. 離散時間隨機程序 8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 1. 需求面管理與節約能源 2. 負載管理策略與成效評估 3. 負載監控與需量控制管理 4. 汽電共生及其他能源應用 5. 配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括 Matlab/Simulink 軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

notes: 綜科 511，電機所與自動化所合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.zh: 銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
description.en: The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.

notes: 職機電所、職製科所合開，限 14 人

description.zh: 碩士學位論文.
description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制 2. 區域型電力能管理策略 3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念 4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析 5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集 6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

description.zh: 中文概述：碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 研究生提出應用科技領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion/implications underlying major research in applied technology through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含 SPSS、ERIC 及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 本課程將探討數位學習國內、外發展現況和不同領域進行分析包含數位學習新興趨勢，並就國內外發展狀況、我國現階段的推動及發展策略進行介紹。
description.en: The course is designed to examine future trends and research in e-learning. It will also explore the issues on the development of e -learning and practical issues.

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目，在教授個別指導下，進行實驗之研究，以培養學生尋找相關資料，文獻及獨立研究的訓練，並將其研究成果撰寫成碩士論文。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study in master level.  Students will be assigned a research topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final master thesis are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括輔 G 熱力學？高分子的微結構及定性。輔 G 熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin 理論、Flory-Krigbaum 理論、相分離、θ- 溫度、滲透壓、GPC 測分子量、高分子膠體。? 高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x - 射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質 (DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA) 和材料機械性質 (伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 此課程屬於高等無機化學特論，針對研究所學生有志於從事應用研究或投入化學工業而開設，有機金屬不只是化學家重要的研究工具也是化學工程師在設計反應的利器。課程內容包括：主族有機金屬、過渡元素之有機金屬化合物、硼族有機金屬、銅銀金之有機金屬、18 價電子原理、s, p 受體予體、有機錫
description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於建築與都市設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into architecture and urban design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800 年到 1900 年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 本課程為台灣傳統建築文化系列課程之一，其主旨在介紹台灣傳統建築的理論與原則，藉由已有的研究案例與成果，使同學能擴展其對台灣傳統建築研究的視界，並就傳統建築中特定建築類型與空間文化議題進行研討，除了經由地方志等文獻的解讀，以了解建築所屬的特殊空間文化意涵外，並由同學進行特定建築的實地調查，以供印證。本課程期使修課同學除了對傳統建築的意義有所瞭解外，亦對特定建築類型的社會文化意義有所體認。
description.en: This course is one of the series of Taiwan traditional architectural culture courses. Its main purpose is to introduce the theories and principles of Taiwanese traditional architecture. With the help of existing research cases and achievements, students can expand their horizons in the study of Taiwanese traditional architecture and learn from traditional architecture. Discussions on specific architectural types and spatial culture issues in architecture, in addition to reading local chronicles and other documents to understand the special spatial cultural meaning of the building, and students conduct field investigations on specific buildings for verification. This course enables students to not only understand the significance of traditional architecture, but also understand the social and cultural significance of specific architectural types.

name.en: Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一。健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二。建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三。生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四。診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

description.zh: 同學們在修過第一年所開的所有的必修課之後，從第三個學期開始，在指導老師的引領下，必須開始著手準備碩士論文的撰寫：選擇論文題目，收集資料，通過論文大綱審查，開始撰寫論文. . . 等等的步驟。從第三個學期開始須修二期之「論文」課程。在論文口試委員們接受該論文並在文件上簽名後，同學們可同時拿到六個學分，完成本碩士課程 "論文" 這一項的要求。
description.en: After completing all the required courses in the first year, every student is encouraged to initiate the working process toward the completion of his/her MA thesis under the supervision of an advisor. Starting from the third semester, it is required for the student to register for "Thesis" for two semesters.  The "Thesis" courses aim to lead graduate students through the process of preparing, writing and completing an MA thesis.  After the committee members agree on the acceptability of the thesis and sign the official document, the student will get a total of 6 credits for "Thesis," fulfilling part of the requirement for a MA degree.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 不同文化之間的對話需要故事的講述。了解一種文化的故事有助於人們了解這種文化並與其人民交談。有時，一種文化會借用另一種文化的故事，或者寫一個關於彼此文化碰撞的故事。(例如，關於亞洲的美國故事，或關於美國的亞洲故事)。為了幫助學生與來自其他文化的人們談論重要的思想，本課程研究跨文化共享故事以及一種文化講述其他文化的故事。
description.en: Conversation between different cultures requires the description of stories.  Knowing a culture’s stories helps one to understand that culture and talk with its people. Sometimes a culture borrows a story from another culture or writes a story about its encounter with that other culture.  (For example, American stories about Asia or Asian stories about America).  To help students talk about important ideas with people from other cultures, this course examines stories shared across cultures and stories one culture tells about another.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

notes: 限 20 人；綜科 110-1 上課

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 在各指導教授的指導下，從事環境規劃與管理等相關領域的論文寫作，其宜包括研究方法或實驗方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。
description.en: A thesis of Ms. Degree should be proposed by all students associated with the agreement of their instructor professor. The thesis focuses on the fields in "Environmental Planning and Management", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 這門課著重在探討奈米科技之基本原理與應用範疇，以及環境應用與安全相關主題，內容包含奈米之基本特性、各種量測方法、結構控制、以及 "納米" 對環境應用與安全問題。此外並包含奈米微粒之產生、收集、測量以及微粒動力學等主題。
description.en: This course will investigate the definition and theories of nanotechnology. Including basic properties, measuring methods, structural control, environmental, and safety issues of "Nano-". Topics about generation, collection, measurement and dynamics of nano-particle will also be covered.

name.en: Special Topics on Nano- Technology and Environment

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: Master  thesis  studying  and  writing .

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 中文課程概述：本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋嵌入式工業視覺系統完整的開發內容，從機器視覺系統流程與演算法設計、嵌入式系統實作、函式庫封裝、人機介面設計、工業相機取像及實際案例分析。其中包含: 1. 嵌入式系統軟體實作：Linux 環境介紹與基本程式設計 2. Qt 人機介面開發 3. 工業用機器視覺演算法 / 系統開發，並提供相關設計概念 4. 實際應用案例與設計流程介紹。學生需要先有 C/C++ 程式語言及影像處理之基礎。
description.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic tools and techniques required to implement Machine Vision on small, embedded, portable platforms. The primary focus will be on the design of industrial vision system based on specialized embedded hardware, with a little less focus on machine vision algorithm. The course will involve: (1) Linux embedded software development; (2) Qt GUI development; (3) development of embedded industrial machine vision algorithm; (4) application practice on the embedded platform, with an industrial camera, to demonstrate real time vision processing. The only pre-requisite for the course is to know C/C++ and image processing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, inter92tive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 光華 409, 限本系生，預選限碩一 10 人，請自備 MAC 筆電

description.zh: 這們課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含： 1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG 4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。 本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。 課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

description.zh: 該課程涵蓋數據和信息的組織和人際關係。您將開發必要的技能和知識，以使用數據和分析來告知管理並做出更好的決策。通過案例和課堂討論，您將學習研究設計，內部諮詢，變更管理，數據解釋和演示的技能。
description.en: This class covers the organizational and interpersonal sides of data and information.  You will develop the skills and knowledge necessary to use data and analytics to inform management and make better decisions.  Through case examples and classroom discussion you will learn skills in research design, internal consulting, change management, data interpretation and presentation.

description.zh: 1. 網路協定、2. 消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準、3. 錯誤更正碼：迴旋碼渦輪碼低密度同位檢查碼 BCH/RS 碼、4. 無線視訊傳輸的抗錯、5. 跨層資源分配、6. 無線區域網路、7. 隨意網路和感測網路、8. 無線個人 / 大都會 / 體域 / 網狀網路、9. 物聯網等最新發展
description.en: 1. Network protocols 2. Information theory, source coding and Video standards 3. channel coding: convolutional codes/turbo codes/LDPC codes/BCH/RS codes 4. Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network 8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 這門課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含：1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG  4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 資料科學為最熱門的職業之一，各行各業對於數據分析的人才需求正在蓬勃發展，本課程在於培育從事資料科學或機器學習的人員來發展相關知識和技能。課程內容以線性代數、機率、統計學等工程數學為理論學習基礎，操作 Python 作為資料科學的實作工具，包括其相關 Python 基礎語法、各種資料型態、數據 可視化、開源工具等。接著學習利用 Python 取得數據資料，進而操作各種迴歸 分析來手動分析數據資料，並實作梯度遞減，決策樹等最佳化演算方法。最後則是介紹機器學習、深度學習等最新的 AI 演算方法來分析大數據並輔助決策。
description.en: Data Science has been ranked as one of the hottest professions and the demand for data practitioners is booming. This course is designed to develop people engaged in data science or machine learning to develop relevant knowledge and skills. You will understand how data science works based on mathematics, such as linear algebra, probability and statistics. Python is the best tool to learn how to conduct data science analyze data. Learn the basic language skills, common data types, visualization tools and extended modules for data grabbing and regression analysis. Gradient decent and decision tree for optimization will be covered. Finally, AI algorithm, machine learning, and deep learning, are introduced how data help in decision making.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 在管理決策中，要如何做行銷管理才能使得公司的產品賣得出去並增加公司收入。要如何做資金管理才能使得公司可以正常營運並將資金做適當的管理決策配置。透過國內外相關公司案例的討論，讓學生可以瞭解消費者行為、市場區隔、產品策略、通路、數位 (含 AI) 行銷等議題，以及對財管的投資、融資、營運資金、公司理財等議題有進一步的理解，讓高階經理人可以有更全面的策略營運方針。
description.en: In management decisions, how should marketing management be conducted to ensure that a company's products sell and increase company revenue? How should financial management be handled to ensure the company operates smoothly and makes appropriate management decisions regarding the allocation of funds? Through discussions of relevant domestic and international company cases, students can gain an understanding of topics such as consumer behavior, market segmentation, product strategy, distribution channels, and digital (including AI) marketing, as well as develop a deeper understanding of financial management topics like investment, financing, working capital, and corporate finance. This will enable senior managers to develop more comprehensive strategic operational guidelines.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討，其中包含: 1. 電子化企業概論 2. 經營模式 3. 企業再造 4. 企業資源管理 5. 中小企業電子化 6. 商業電子化 7. 供應鏈管理 8. 需求鏈管理 9. 協同預測管理 10. 個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 介紹概念和解決問題的技術在生產管理和運營管理中的重要性。主題包括需求預測、容量管理、資源配置、庫存管理、供應鏈管理、品質控制和專案管理。
description.en: Introduction to concepts and problem-solving techniques important in production management and operations management. Topics include demand forecasting, capacity management, resource allocation, inventory management, supply chain management, quality control, and project management.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程旨在深入介紹統計技術和最佳化概念，藉以輔助管理之決策。課程涵蓋統計學及最佳化相關主題，包括描述性統計、相關分析、抽樣和估計、概率分布、假設檢驗、回歸模型、實驗設計和線性規劃。通過課程學生還將獲得統計和最佳化軟件（如 LINGO 和 Excel）的實際操作經驗。修習課程之學生將具備應用統計和最佳化工具處理實務問題之技能和知識，使其能夠基於數量方法之做出決策及管理。
description.en: This course aims to offer an in-depth understanding of statistical techniques and optimization concepts for making informed management decisions. The course provides a comprehensive overview of key topics in statistics, including descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, sampling and estimation, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, regression models, design of experiments, and linear programming. Students will also gain practical experience in statistical and optimization software such as LINGO and Excel through interactive tutorials. On completion of this course, students would be able to equip with the skills and knowledge needed to apply statistical and optimization tools to real-life situations, allowing them to make informed decisions based on quantitative methods.

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

description.zh: 強調現代人力資源管理理論與實踐的戰略視角。主題包括人力資源規劃，人員編制，培訓和發展，薪酬，績效評估和勞資關係。
description.en: Emphasizes strategic perspective of modern human resource management theory and practice. Topics include human resource planning, staffing, training and development, compensation, performance appraisal, and labor and employee relations.

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

description.zh: 介紹管理會計的概念、目的、問題、方法和術語。先修課程：ACCT 5301（會計分析 I）與 C 級或更高階的會計課程
description.en: Introduction to concepts, purposes, problems, methodology, and terminology of managerial accounting. Prerequisite: ACCT 5301 (ACCOUNTING ANALYSIS I) with a grade of C or higher.

name.en: Measurement and Analysis for Business Decision Making

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: EMBA 最重要核心精神為領導力與團隊合作能力，本課程希望培養在企業競爭激烈的環境之下，如何領導企業轉型，並以團隊合作模式加以執行的能力。課程設計為兩天的內容：包括創新與創業的精神、跨領域團隊建立、藉由活動達成團隊學習與互動、團隊凝聚力建立、領導力的訓練與培養、EMBA 應具備的四到 (學到、交到、做到、玩到)。
description.en: The core value of Taipei Tech’s EMBA program is leadership and teamwork. This course is to develop the ability to lead business transformation and team building in the dynamic economic environment. There are six parts in this course: 1. Entrepreneurship 2. Team building with cross-fields 3. Team learning and interactions 4. Leadership 5. Four must-do in EMBA( to Learn, Make friends, play, and make it)

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知 2.	企業管理的經營模式認知 3.	導入運用的方法與案例 4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會)，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed.

name.zh: 企業精實與全球品質管理
name.en: A Lean and Mean Business and Global Quality Management

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 這門課程將深入探討 ESG 概念及其在國際趨勢中的地位，包括 CBAM、CCA、TCFD 等法規，亦將闡述國際評比、CSRD、IFRS S1/S2 等要求，以及國內主管機關的法規，尤其關於公司治理藍圖的要求。透過工作坊形式，我們將聚焦氣候變遷和財務相關揭露的重點，並以案例分享產業實務。從國際法規如 SB253、CBAM 到國際標準 ISO 20400，我們也將討論供應鏈管理和永續採購的趨勢。此外，將涵蓋人權相關議題，如 TIFD 和 DEI，以及永續報告書撰寫注意事項。最後，我們將介紹永續金融和責任投融資，並討論金融業永續法規對企業的影響。
description.en: This course explores ESG concepts and global trends like CBAM, CCA, and TCFD. We'll cover international ratings, CSRD, IFRS S1/S2, and domestic regulatory requirements, focusing on corporate governance. Through workshops and case studies, we'll highlight climate change and financial disclosures. We'll discuss supply chain management trends, ISO 20400, and human rights issues like TIFD and DEI. Additionally, we'll cover sustainability reporting guidelines and introduce sustainable finance and responsible investment, examining their impact on businesses and financial regulations.

name.zh: 永續發展與綠色金融管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Green Banking Management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (關聯群 2)

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業 / 工業 4.0 調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業 / 工業 4.0 產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理 (Variational Principles)、Lagrange 方程式、Hamilton 原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。
description.en: This course is based on the principle of mechanical engineering and electrochemical theory to introduce the basic principles and types of fuel cells. From the latest development in the global market, the course will introduce the fuel cell history and the latest products of fuel cells. The improvement of fuel cell efficiency and lifetime will be explained through   fundamental theory and experiments.

name.en: Principle and application of fuel cell

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹光電半導體的基本原理與應用，幫助同學們了解光電元件如發光二極體的製程、封裝、及測試技術的發展，由市場應用概況導入，含蓋設計研發、製造生產、與特性量測等範疇，說明光電元件的光熱電特性對元件效率的影響，並搭配實驗方式深入了解。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles and applications of optoelectronic semiconductors such as light emitting diodes to help students understand the fabrication process, packaging, and test technologies This course includes application, design and manufacturing. In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

name.zh: 光電半導體元件技術及應用
name.en: Optoelectronic semiconductor device technology and application

notes: 機電所甲組◎; 甲、乙組選修，限 20 人

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

notes: 甲、乙組選修；機電、製科合開；限 21 人

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 這門課著重在探討奈米科技之基本原理與應用範疇，以及環境應用與安全相關主題，內容包含奈米之基本特性、各種量測方法、結構控制、以及 "納米" 對環境應用與安全問題。此外並包含奈米微粒之產生、收集、測量以及微粒動力學等主題。
description.en: This course will investigate the definition and theories of nanotechnology. Including basic properties, measuring methods, structural control, environmental, and safety issues of "Nano-". Topics about generation, collection, measurement and dynamics of nano-particle will also be covered.

name.en: Special Topics on Nano- Technology and Environment

description.zh: 這門課除了複習企業環境管理與企業永續的策略做法外，主要在於深入探究金字塔底層 (BOP) 與創造共享價值 (Creating Shared Value, CSV) 之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In addition to the strategies of corporate environmental management and corporate sustainability, this course will be focusing on the theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

notes: 碩二生需上及下學期各一次選課紀錄

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

notes: 碩二必修 (畢業前須修滿兩門論文)

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis.

notes: 擬 114-1 畢業者，須累計加選 2 門 6 學分論文

description.zh: 人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。
description.en: 人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。AI tools can provide many benefits in the field of environmental engineering and management, and one of the main advantages of using AI tools is their ability to effectively analyze and process large amounts of data. The complexity of environmental data is a challenging obstacle, and AI provides more accurate predictions, continuous monitoring, risk assessment, and problem solving. This course will briefly introduce the development of AI technology, as well as application cases in the fields of AI-related Internet of Things, environmental monitoring, environmental quality prediction, environmental research, etc., as well as

name.zh: 人工智慧於環境工程與管理之運用
name.en: AI Applications in Environmental Engineering and Management

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念 2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式 3. 形狀函數及等參數元素 4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等 5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題：一般實體 7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理 8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用 9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 超音波技術簡介 2. 基礎彈性力學 3. 彈性動力學 4. 平面波 5. 平面波的反射 6. 平面波的折射 7. 表面波 8. 藍姆波 (平板波) 9. 超音波於非破壞檢測之應用 10. 超音波於材料性質量測之應用 11. 超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用 12. 超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用 13. 超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

description.zh: 學習敏捷與精實軟體開發方法與敏捷實務作法。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：一、Scrum 方法二、終極編程方法三、看板方法四、終極編程核心與配套實務作法五、精實軟體開發實務做法
description.en: Students will learn Agile and Lean software development methods and agile practices. This course will cover the following topics:一、Scrum method二、XP method三、Kanban method四、XP primary and corollary practices五、Lean software development practices

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊 (及訓練演算法)，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等。
description.en: This course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of the course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, the course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optimizations, random search, decision tree, random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model, support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques, boosting methods, decision level fusion techniques, and reinforcement learning.

description.zh: 1. 數位影像處理的基礎 2. 影像的轉換 3. 影像的加強 4. 影像的復原 5. 彩色影像的處理 6. 影像的壓縮 7. 影像的分割與特徵抽取 8. 影像的表達及描述 9. 影像的辨認與解釋 10. 導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement 4. Image restoration 5. Color image processing. 6. Image compression. 7. Image segmentation and feature detection 8. Representation and desciption 9. Recogmition and interpretation  10. Applications: ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 模糊集合之觀念與數學定理、模糊集合之數學運算、近似推理理論、解模糊化方法之設計、模糊控制器之設計、模糊控制器之數學模式、模糊控制器之理論分析、模糊控制器之應用實例分析。
description.en: Basic concepts and mathematical theories of fuzzy sets, Operations on fuzzy sets, Theory of approximate reasoning, Defuzzification methods, Design of fuzzy controllers, Mathematical models of fuzzy controllers, Theoretical analysis of fuzzy controllers, Practical applications of fuzzy controllers.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

notes: 限 15 人；綜科 327 上課

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 國際合作專題特論乃透過國際大師的講課，讓學生學習材料科學或資源工程相關領域的重要知識及了解最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application in the materials science and mineral engineering. Speakers being invited are well-known international scholars in the related area.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 限碩二，修課人數為 35 名

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過 "粉末冶金學" 的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程以全球通史為基礎，以「從史前到古代文明」為主軸：探討人類從史前時代到古代文明的生活型態與設計發展。課程將涵蓋原始社會的生存工具、居住環境、裝飾藝術，進而延伸至美索不達米亞、埃及、印度、中國、希臘與羅馬等古代文明的城市規劃、建築風格、手工藝與社會結構。透過對這些歷史階段的分析，學生將理解不同社會如何運用材料、技術與文化價值觀來塑造其生活環境，並探討這些設計遺產對現代社會的影響。此外，課程將引導學生思考古代設計對現代可持續發展與文化復興的啟發，並透過研究與小組討論，發展歷史與設計的跨領域思維。
description.en: This course is based on A Global History and centers on the theme "From Prehistory to Ancient Civilizations," exploring the development of human lifestyles and design from prehistoric times to early civilizations. The course covers survival tools, living environments, and decorative arts of primitive societies, extending to urban planning, architectural styles, craftsmanship, and social structures of ancient civilizations such as Mesopotamia, Egypt, India, China, Greece, and Rome. Through the analysis of these historical periods, students will understand how different societies utilized materials, technologies, and cultural values to shape their living environments and examine the influence of these design legacies on modern society.
