Additionally, the course will encourage students to consider how ancient design can inspire modern sustainability and cultural revival. Through research and group discussions, students will develop an interdisciplinary perspective on history and design.

name.zh: 設計與生活型態研究 (一)

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生在人機互動設計中的運算思維與解決問題的能力。課程將針對設計背景學生在學習程式設計時的挑戰，藉由多階段的教學設計與工具輔助，降低程式學習門檻，促進學生跨領域整合能力，並提升其在設計與技術跨領域的創新實作能力。課程具體涵蓋以下教學目標：1. 促進運算思維能力與邏輯推理能力的發展 2. 提升學生學習程式設計之動機與自信心 3. 促進跨領域知識整合與應用能力 4. 提升學習動機與創新實作能力
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' computational thinking and problem-solving skills in human-computer interaction design. It primarily targets students without an information technology background and addresses the challenges faced by design-background students in learning programming. Through multi-stage teaching design and tool assistance, the course reduces the barriers to programming learning, promotes cross-disciplinary integration, and enhances students' innovative implementation abilities in the intersection of design and technology. The course specifically covers the following objectives:1. Promote the development of computational thinking and logical reasoning abilities 2. Enhance students' motivation and confidence in learning programming 3. Facilitate cross-disciplinary knowledge integration and application 4. Boost learning motivation and innovative implementation abilities

name.zh: 人機互動設計與技術實作
name.en: Human-Computer Interaction Design and Technical Practice

notes: 排 PBL 教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生有關電子設備散熱設計之相關原理與技術。介紹各項電子元件之發熱量、溫度與元件穩定性之關係，熱對流、熱輻射等熱傳原理在電子設備散熱之的應用法則；解說電子設備散熱器之演進與設計原理，如：熱管之原理與演進、小型風散之特性與設計原則等。探討電子設備的熱阻抗分析、溫度計算、熱應力分析，並介紹相關電腦輔助分析軟體。
description.en: This course introduces principles and techniques of thermal management and cooling design of electronic equipments.  Subjects of this course include: thermal and physical properties of electronic components, thermo-fluid phenomena and principles of thermal management for electronic devices, and the evolution of cooling devices such as heat pipes and micro fans, discussion of analysis methodologies and computer software of thermal management problems including thermal resistances, temperature gradient, and thermal stress.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

notes: 設計博核心選修 (701-1 室)

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何整合科技於文化創意產業，透過案例教學，幫助學生結合有效率的資訊科技工具於人文藝術，以發展文化創意產業，並創造高附加價值的效益。當今產、官、學、研都強調跨域整合的重要性，文創與互動科技的結合，能為文化創意作加值，並注入新生命、新體驗，因此，文創遇到科技後，所激盪出的火花與創意，已逐漸受到產、學界的青睞。本課程將探討文化創意的發展脈絡、文創的底蘊與其應用面、互動科技的應用，透過文獻研讀、案例分析等方式，瞭解國外最新研究與趨勢，討論文創與科技的創新應用可行性，引領文化創意產業轉型，規劃未來文創與科技整合的新契機。
description.en: The course intends to explore about how to integrate the technology into the cultural and creative Industries. Through case study, it will help students to combine efficient information technology tools in the field of arts and humanities, and also facilitate the development of cultural and creative industries, and create high value-added benefits for these industries. Today's industry, government, academia, research has emphasized the importance of cross-discipline consolidation. It means that cultural creation and interactive technology combined with value-added as a bonus for the cultural creation, and implant new life, new experiences. Therefore, when the cultural creation encounter technology, which bring out the spark and creativity, has gradually been favored both with industry  and academia. This course will explore the cultural creative context, cultural inside information and its application, the interactive technology application by using the method of literature review, cas

name.en: Special Integration Topics on Technology in Cultural and Creative Industry

notes: 設計博核心選修 (701-1 室)

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor(s). The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程主要敘述數位語音訊號的處理技術及語音相關應用。討論的課題主要包括語音分析的基本聲學原理如發音模型與語音特徵分析，以及語音編碼、語音合成、語音辨認等重要應用。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the fundamentals of speech signal processing and related applications. The topics it will address include speech production model, extraction and evaluation of speech features, basic principles of speech analysis and synthesis, speech coding, and speech recognition, etc.

description.zh: 電容切換式電路、振盪器、濾波器、鎖相迴路、非線性與匹配效應、短通道效應與元件模型、類比電路佈局與包裝
description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

name.zh: 高等類比積體電路設計

notes: 電機碩班、半導體學位學程合開

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出 (MIMO) 傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下：1. 無線通道模型 2. 多樣性 3. 通道容量 4.MIMO I: 空間多工 5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構 6.MIMO III: 多樣性與多工間取捨 7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 線性區段碼 3. 循環碼 4. 迴旋碼 5. 編碼調變
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Linear Block Codes3.Cyclic Codes4.Convolutional Codes5.Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督 / 非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論，Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習，K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function 多分類器，Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類，分類正確率評估 (Accuracy Assessments) 及其他重要的應用，例如：文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

notes: 電機所、電資學生班和創新 AI 合開

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）應用 2-1 ANN 基礎 2-2 類神經網路 3. 模糊邏輯基礎 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用 4. 基因演算法 4-1 概述 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用
description.en: 1 Introduction2 Application of artificial neural networks (ANN)2-1 ANN fundamentals2-2 Neur-control3 Fuzzy logic control3-1 Fuzzy logic basics3-2 Application of Fuzzy Control4 Genetic algorithms4-1 Preliminarg    4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

notes: 自動化所和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法，變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
description.en: English Description:  This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and applications of optimal control. The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 限 20 人；綜科 110-2 上課

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: C 語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導 C 程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation 應用等，除了於 PC 上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有 case study 來輔助教學以及了解 C 語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬 CPU 排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

name.zh: 進階 C 語言實務

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1) 各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線 (2) 氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線 (3) 分子轉印技術 (4) 奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 基本可靠度方法 3. 頻率與區間法 4. 互連系統 5. 備載操作 6. 輸電系統可靠度 7. 配電系統可靠度 8. 變電系統可靠度
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Basic probability methods 3. Frequency and duration method4. Interconnected systems 5. Operating reserve 6. Composite and transmission systems7. Distribution systems 8. substation and switching stations

notes: 綜科 514, 限職電機所電力組學生修讀。

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與計算生物學及醫學資訊學相關之重要主題。 學生能夠了解如何正確分析生物和醫學數據所衍伸的問題及應用。 希望透過課程協助同學了解和學習如何組裝基因體資料和醫學數據分析中經常使用的演算法技術內容，閱讀最新相關生醫技術論文及使用開放工具，增進實際操作之經驗或自行建構分析生醫相關資料之應用系統。
description.en: This course is designed to provide important topics in computational biology and medical informatics. Students are able to learn about problems involved in the generation and analysis of biological and medical data. The course intends to provide good understanding of the commonly used algorithms and public tools in the analysis of genomic and medical data, to read updated scientific reports, and to increase hands-on experiences with accessing and using relevant databases.

name.zh: 計算生物學及醫學資訊

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹經濟分析之研究方法，不僅探討為何經濟分析之研究方法受到重視外，還會討論以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密等相關之智慧財產權，以達成理論與實際並重之教學目的。
description.en: This course will be introductions regarding research methods of economic analyses. This course not only why this research methods of economic analyses are important, but also discusses copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets, etc. Purpose of this course is both to put emphasis on theories and practices for teaching.

name.en: Economic Analyses of Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 智慧財產是國際貿易中的重要一環，近 20 年來，由於知識經濟的發展與國際多邊條約的興起，國際架構下的智財法制愈形重要。各國無不苦思如何在保護主義與自由貿易之間取得平衡，此時研究國際貿易角力下的智財發展，具有相當意義。本課程即在提供學生對重要國際組織與條約下所形成的智財法制的基本了解，並由實務案例的討論中，帶領同學分析國際智財法制對國家經濟、法規面的影響。
description.en: Intellectual Property has played an important role as an integral part of the international trade, and its significance has been increasing over the past two decades contributed by the burgeoning international treaties and knowledge-driven economic models.  While individual nations struggle to achieve national prosperity by striking a balance between protectionism and free trade, the changes in intellectual property law and policy under the tussle of international trade are worth of our close attention.  This course intends to provide students with a general understanding on both the theories and practice of intellectual property legal regimes within the context of international trade. Students will learn how the frameworks of intellectual property law and policy affect the societies and economies of individual member states of international treaties. By drawing selected cases for discussion, students will further be equipped with abilities to analyze the impact of international treati

name.zh: 國際貿易與智財專題研究

description.zh: 本課程所定義的文化產業包括音樂產業、電視產業、電影產業、劇場產業和其他表演藝術有關的產業。這些產業區塊都存在相關的智慧財產權議題，例如所有權、權利轉讓、合理使用、侵權行為、契約爭議等等。本課程將透過法院判決的選讀與產業案例研究來讓學生認識文化產業的智慧財產權議題。學生將被要求參與討論。評分方式包括課堂參與和報告。
description.en: The scope of the cultural industry covered by this course includes the music industry, film industry, television industry, theatre industry, and other industries related to performing arts. Intellectual property issues do exist in these industrial sectors. The issues include ownership, title transfer, fair use, infringement, contract dispute, and so on. This course is intended to expose students to various IP issues in the cultural industry through studying court decisions and discussing industrial case studies. Students are required to participate in discussion. The grading policy is based on class participation and essay paper.

name.zh: 文化產業與智慧財產權
name.en: Cultural Industry and Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1. 全球企業發展的外在環境、2. 全球技術突破與創新產業、3. 各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP 產業建置、5. 全球品牌智財市場、6. 全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7. 創新研發的保護方式、8. 協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9. 兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10. 跨國視野下的法律議題、11. 企業智財部門規劃、12. 併購與智財授權管理、13. 品牌智財的財務價值、14. 著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

description.zh: 本課程將介紹經濟分析之研究方法，不僅探討為何經濟分析之研究方法受到重視外，還會討論以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密等相關之智慧財產權，以達成理論與實際並重之教學目的。
description.en: This course will be introductions regarding research methods of economic analyses. This course not only why this research methods of economic analyses are important, but also discusses copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets, etc. Purpose of this course is both to put emphasis on theories and practices for teaching.

name.en: Economic Analyses of Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程所定義的文化產業包括音樂產業、電視產業、電影產業、劇場產業和其他表演藝術有關的產業。這些產業區塊都存在相關的智慧財產權議題，例如所有權、權利轉讓、合理使用、侵權行為、契約爭議等等。本課程將透過法院判決的選讀與產業案例研究來讓學生認識文化產業的智慧財產權議題。學生將被要求參與討論。評分方式包括課堂參與和報告。
description.en: The scope of the cultural industry covered by this course includes the music industry, film industry, television industry, theatre industry, and other industries related to performing arts. Intellectual property issues do exist in these industrial sectors. The issues include ownership, title transfer, fair use, infringement, contract dispute, and so on. This course is intended to expose students to various IP issues in the cultural industry through studying court decisions and discussing industrial case studies. Students are required to participate in discussion. The grading policy is based on class participation and essay paper.

name.zh: 文化產業與智慧財產權
name.en: Cultural Industry and Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 太空科技應用課程旨在介紹太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，並探討太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
description.en: The Space Technology Application Course aims to introduce the application of space technology in various fields, and explore how space technology impacts human life and scientific research. The course covers topics including space exploration, Earth observation, communication and satellite navigation, space engineering and materials science, space biology and medicine, and space economy and business. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the application of space technology in various fields and future development directions, and be able to master relevant technologies and knowledge.

name.zh: 深度學習與太空科技應用

description.zh: 「太空軟體系統設計」課程旨在培養學生在太空任務中設計、開發和操作軟體系統的專業能力。學生將深入了解太空環境對軟體系統的特殊要求，包括真空、輻射、溫度等因素對系統性能的影響。課程將探討飛行軟體的設計和架構，學生將學習如何設計出能夠在極端條件下穩定運行的飛行軟體系統，確保太空任務的順利執行。此外，課程將涵蓋軟體驗證和確認技術，學生將學習如何確保軟體系統的功能性和安全性，並掌握各種測試方法和工具的應用。課程還將關注容錯和自我修復能力的設計，學生將學習如何設計具有容錯和自我修復功能的軟體系統，以應對可能的故障情況。最後，課程將介紹太空軟體系統的專案管理和實施，學生將學習如何有效地管理軟體開發專案，確保項目按時交付並符合品質標準。此外，課程還將包括深度學習在太空軟體系統中的應用，學生將探索如何利用深度學習技術來改進太空任務中的軟體系統設計和性能，以及酬載資料處理軟體的設計和開發，以支援太空任務中的資料收集和分析。通過本課程的學習，學生將具備設計和開發太空軟體系統所需的技能和知識，為未來在太空工程或相關領域的工作做好準備。
description.en: The course "Space Software System Design" aims to cultivate students' professional abilities in designing, developing, and operating software systems for space missions. Students will gain in-depth understanding of the special requirements that the space environment imposes on software systems, including the impact of factors such as vacuum, radiation, and temperature on system performance. The course will explore the design and architecture of flight software, teaching students how to design flight software systems that can operate stably under extreme conditions, ensuring the smooth execution of space missions. Additionally, the course will cover software verification and validation techniques, enabling students to ensure the functionality and safety of software systems and master various testing methods and tools.

description.zh: 1. 授課目的：  現代都市計劃及都市設計作業內容中，必須考量都市永續環境生態之議題。本課程之目的即在於傳述都市之生態概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容及其行政程序，以培養學生永續都市及敷地計畫規劃能力。2. 授課內容：  由基本永續都市中，思考生態環境、人類生活環境及建築之間的相互關係。綠建築、永續都市之內容。引介各項生態技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而論證其都計管制規範。3. 作業練習：  本學期藉由實驗操作、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用規劃能力，以利學生認識都市生態技術及都計行政作業之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位規劃思辯能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the issues of the environmental planning, green buildings and sustainable urban design. Its major content includes: 1. Study of relation between Ecosystem, human environment and architecture, 2. essay of Green Building and Sustainable Cities, 3. The case study of Green Building design and Sustainable City Planning.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 本課程探討體驗設計的基本概念與理論基礎，涵蓋感知與情感設計 (Perception & Emotion Design)、使用者行為 (User Behavior)、身體經驗 (Embodied Experience)、文化脈絡 (Cultural Context) 等主題。學生將學習如何分析人類的感官、情緒與互動方式，理解不同文化、環境與社會因素對體驗的影響，並透過案例研究與實地觀察，探索如何透過設計創造有意義且具影響力的體驗。
description.en: This course explores the fundamental concepts and theories of experience design, covering topics such as perception and emotion design, user behavior, embodied experience, and cultural context. Students will learn to analyze human sensory perception, emotions, and interaction patterns while understanding how cultural, environmental, and social factors influence experiences. Through case studies and field observations, students will investigate how design can create meaningful and impactful experiences.

description.zh: 設計科學研究重視創造與解決現實世界問題相關且實用的成品或服務。目標是開發具有實用價值並可在實務中實施的解決方案或進一步進行設計驗證。課堂進行方式，除了方法講解，將於課堂採用方法卡與結構化的課堂互動模式，深化學生對設計學在學術研究方法的認識與應用。學生將學會：1. 理解設計學的範疇與趨勢 2. 理解如何擬定研究命題與設計研究方法 3. 理解量化與質性研究方法 4. 理解研究結果的詮釋與視覺化 5. 擬定研究命題、研究框架、研究流程與方法
description.en: Design science research values the creation of finished products or service that are relevant and useful in solving real-world problems. The goal is to develop solutions that have practical value and can be implemented in practice or for further design verification. In addition to method explanations, method cards and a structured classroom interaction mode will be used in class to deepen students' understanding and application of design methods in academic research. Students will learn:1.Understand the scope and trends of design2.Understand how to formulate research propositions and design research methods3.Understand quantitative and qualitative research methods4.Understand the interpretation and visualization of research results5.Formulate research propositions, research framework, research processes and methods

name.zh: 設計學研究方法與實踐策略
name.en: Design Science Research Methods & Practical Strategies

description.zh: 產品系統研發的過程漫長，為確保其設計產出貼近市場脈動，具有創新性及競爭力，必須透過大量閱讀、即時掌握新興科技發展趨勢、蒐集分析國際知名實際案例。本課程旨在培養學生對國際趨勢的敏銳度，整合跨領域專業的洞察力，了解不同世代的獨特需求脈絡，如何延伸到產品設計應用與跨國團隊合作，進而發掘有影響力的設計研究議題。
description.en: The ever-changing design trends are influenced by many factors that lead to increasingly complex challenges for people, society and the environment. To keep up with the state-of-the-art research and emerging technologies, designers need to acquire a rich body of knowledge and transfer integrated insights from various disciplines to the new product development. This course focuses on the cultivation of students’ critical thinking ability through analyzing the global design case studies and literature. Students will be asked to take a very active role to contribute to discussions and presentations.

notes: 設計 701-1 室，上限 7 人

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 機器人學概述、機器人運動學、路徑規劃、機器人避障、機器人視覺、任務規劃、機器人動力學與控制系統
description.en: English Description  General Induction, Manipulator Kinematics, Trajectory Planning, Collision Avoidance, Robot Vision, Task Planning,Manipulator Dynamics and Control

notes: 電機、自動化所、電資外生和機械外生合開

description.zh: 原子結構、排列與運動、材料之顯微結構與相結構、材料之機械性質 - 疲勞、破裂、潛變、材料之電性 - 電傳導性與半導體性、材料之光性與介電性、材料之磁性、材料之熱學性質、材料在微電元件之應用、複合材料。9. 複合材料。
description.en: Contents:1.Fundamentals: Atomic scale structure, Crystal structure. 2.Microstructural development: Phase equilibriums and phase diagram. 3.Properties: Mechanical properties, Electrical properties, Dielectric properties, Magnetic properties, Thermal properties. 4.Composite materials.5.Applications on the Electrical-mechanical devices. Objectives: To improve the related knowledge of materials on the electrical-mechanical devices.

notes: 機電、製科、外生專班和機電博合開；限 30 人

description.zh: 於 2009 年，ASTM 定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 機電、外生專班和機電博合開；限 40 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

notes: 製科、外生專班合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構，鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係，是一門實務性，基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性，塑性行為，差排理論，單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形，複合材料，高溫聚晶材料之變形，非晶質材料之永久變形，材料強化機構，材料破壞，潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

notes: 製科、外生專班合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 線性彈性力學 2. 變分法 3. 變分法應用到彈性力學 4. 結構力學 5. 扭力 6. 能量法 7. 彈性穩定 8. 材料選擇.
description.en: 1.Linear Elasticity 2.Variational Method 3.Variational Principles of Elasticity 4. Structural Mechanics 5.Torsion 6.Energy Method 7.Elastic Stability 8.Materials Selection

notes: 製科。機械外。機電博和鐵道合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 雷射乃 20 世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

notes: 機電、外生專班合開；排三 ABC；綜科 110-2

description.zh: 工業 4.0 智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. Cloud database technology is the core of an intelligent factory, which can reach the intelligent network and control from intelligent production order to website control.

notes: 機電、製科合開；限 10 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

notes: 碩博合開，碩一、二修 (上課地點：科技大樓國際會議廳)

description.zh: 衛星科技與工程導論的課程將介紹衛星系統及次系統基礎知識，以培養具有從事衛星任務設計之基礎能力。課程內容包括：衛星基本原理，衛星設計與製造，衛星運行與維護，衛星通訊與遙測應用，衛星發展趨勢。
description.en: The course "Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering" will introduce the basic knowledge of satellite systems and subsystems to cultivate the fundamental abilities needed for designing satellite missions. The course content includes: the basic principles of satellites, satellite design and manufacturing, satellite operation and maintenance, satellite communication and remote sensing applications, and satellite development trends.

name.en: Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和 GPS 資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 土木專題特論乃透過國際學者的講課，讓學生學習土木相關領域的重要知識及了解最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
description.en: This course will provide important knowledge and information regarding to the latest development or application on the field of civil engineering. Speakers being invited are well-known international scholars in the related area.

name.en: Civil Engineering Colloquy on Special Topics c

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統 (Geographical Information System，簡稱 GIs) 之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹地工合成材料之種類、功能及其於工程領域之應用，並以土壤加勁為核心主題，培養學生具備設計、分析與評估加勁構造物 (含擋土牆與邊坡) 之理論與實務能力。課程內容亦涵蓋相關之施工技術、監測與維護方法、國內外實務案例，並進一步探討加勁構造物於天然災害防治上之應用與最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The overall objective of this course is to introduce the types, and functions, of geosynthetics and their engineering applications. Specifically, this course focuses on the soil reinforcement and provide students the fundamentals and tools needed for design, analysis, and performance evaluation of geosynthetic-reinforced soil (GRS) structures including both walls and slopes. Class also discusses construction, monitoring, maintenance, case histories as well as current state-of-art applications of GRS structures against various natural disasters.

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理 (內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: The application of computer in construction managementThe basic knowledge in computer, the basic design thought and current system practical training in Chinese-English word process system , the functional explain and application in EXCEL, the basic concept in information management system , the basic concept in engineer information management system , the design of database and database software system's practice, simple application in statistics drafting software and other current computer's technology development and other application in construction management.

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 在當代營建產業中，項目日益複雜且數據量龐大，傳統管理方法已難以應對高效率、低成本和永續發展的需求。計算智慧作為人工智慧的重要分支，能有效處理不確定性、非線性和高維度問題，為營建管理帶來突破性變革。本課程系統性介紹計算智慧技術（涵蓋機器學習、深度學習、模糊系統、進化計算等）如何應用於營建管理各環節。本課程旨在培養同學理解各類演算法的基本原理與適用場景，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備計算智慧技術的應用能力。
description.en: In today's construction industry, projects are becoming increasingly complex with massive volumes of data, making traditional management approaches inadequate to meet the demands for high efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and sustainable development. Computational intelligence, as a crucial branch of artificial intelligence, can effectively address uncertainties, nonlinearities, and high-dimensional problems, bringing transformative changes to construction management. This course systematically introduces how computational intelligence technologies—including machine learning, deep learning, fuzzy systems, evolutionary computation, and more—can be applied across various aspects of construction management. The course aims to equip students with an understanding of the fundamental principles and practical applications of multiple algorithms while also developing their skills in applying computational intelligence techniques through hands-on projects and software implementation.

name.zh: 計算智慧於營建管理之應用
name.en: Application of Computational Intelligence in Construction Management

notes: 全英 / 劉琦允老師 / 土木 208

description.zh: 隨著生成式 AI 與大型語言模型迅速融入設計流程與數位產品開發，互動設計者需具備整合 AI 技術與人機介面設計的跨域素養。本課程旨在探討人工智慧技術於人機互動設計中的應用，培養學生設計與開發智慧互動系統的核心能力。課程內容涵蓋人機互動及互動設計之基本概念、語意理解與回應機制、以及 AI 驅動之使用者體驗創新。教學上將透過講述法和工作坊建立基礎觀念，搭配上機實作強化技術操作能力，並以專題導向學習形式，引導學生完成從構思到原型開發之完整設計流程。
description.en: As generative AI and large language models (LLMs) reshape design processes, interaction designers must integrate AI technologies with human-computer interface design to enhance the user experience. This course explores the application of AI in human-computer interaction (HCI), focusing on essential skills for developing intelligent interactive systems. Topics include HCI fundamentals, semantic understanding and response mechanisms, and AI-driven innovations in user experience. Lectures build theoretical foundations, hands-on practice strengthens technical skills, and project-based learning guides students from ideation to prototyping.

notes: 排先鋒 PBL 教室，日碩 / 互動三合開，限 30 人修，需自備筆電

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC 七大手法，ISO9000 等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員整體規劃能力。
description.en: In recent years, due to the rapid development of computer technology, Geographic Information System (GIS) that integrates text and graphics has become quite mature in terms of its operational procedures. This course will focus on the application of GIS functionality and analyze its main architecture and theory. It will also use relevant GIS software to help students develop their overall planning capabilities."

description.zh: 引介混凝土材料微巨觀性質、力學行為與新設計觀念。
description.en: (1)Basic Material Porperties-An Overview.(2)Coment Hydration and Microstructure.(3)Concrete Strength Development.(4)Creep and Shrinkage of Plain and Structural Concrete.(5)Durabiltiy.(6)High-Temmperature Effent:Design of Fire Resistance of    Concrete Structural Members.(7)Very Low Temperature Effects:Design of Concrete Vessels    for Cryogenic Liquids.(8)Linear Elastic Fracture Mechanics:tress Approach and    Energy Approach.(9)Special Type of Concrete Materials(High Performance    Concrete).(10)Micromecanics of Fibrous Composites-Elastic Modules and    Stress-Strain Relation Tensile Strength of Fiber    Reinforced Reinforced Composites.

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端運算發展近況及基本概念 2. 資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3. 雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6. 雲端服務規劃，7. 雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8. 專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 認識心理與教育測驗的起源、發展、運用與測驗實施及倫理議題，同時探討常模與標準化、信度、效度、測驗研發編製 (含項目分析) 的理論基礎。
description.en: To realize origin, development, application, test implementation and ethical issues of psychological and educational test and explore theories of norms, standardization, reliability, validity and test development (including item analysis)

description.zh: 本課程將介紹國內外的房屋生產系統和裝修技術案例。該課程將在以下主題中進行。A. 規劃審查施工生產的總體方向，包括施工合同，項目預算，生命週期，  風險管理和資金分配方法。B. 設計物流和裝貨的程度，施工方法。 設計系統，建築設計智能，建築材  料和性能。 建築生產對社會的影響。C. 施工現場調查，施工計劃，施工前時間表，施工管理，方法及其演變。D. 裝修建築拆除或裝修的評估標準，裝修計劃，設計，項目，法令和系統。E. 拆除：建築拆除的機械和方法，以及建築廢料的再利用。
description.en: This course will introduce the domestic and foreign housing production system and renovation technology cases.The course will be conducted in the following topics.A.	Planning A review of the overall direction of construction production, including construction contract, project budget,life cycle, risk management and method of fund dispatch.B.	Design The degree of logistics and loading, construction method. Design system, building design intelligence,building materials and performance. The influence of construction production to society.C.	Construction The site investigation, construction plan, time schedule before construction, construction management,methods and their evolutions.D.	Renovation The assessment criteria of building demolition or renovation, the renovation plan, design, project, decree and system.E.	Demolition：The building demolition machinery and methods, and the reuse of building waste materials.

notes: 新聘甲組老師授課，全英授課

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 1.MOS 元件工作模式及 MOSFET 原理 2. 微小 MOSFET 的額外考慮 3. 矽晶圓的生長 4. 擴 散 5. 離子植入 6. 氧化處理 7.CVD 技術 8. 微影術 9. 蒸鍍與濺鍍 10. 光罩製作 11.CMOS IC 製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號 CMOS 積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 混合訊號設計概述 2. 連續時間濾波器 3. 交換電容濾波器 4. 交換電流濾波器 5. 數位類比轉換器 6. 類比數位轉換器 7. 超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8. 管線式類比數位轉換器 9. 混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程探討地面站網路切片技術及其在實際應用中的服務品質保證方法。課程將涵蓋地面站網路的基本概念，包括結構、架構，以及與通訊系統相關的各種技術。學生將透過深入理論學習和實務案例，瞭解地面站網路切片的原理及其在提供不同服務的情境中的優勢。在課程中，學生將學習如何實施地面站網路切片，包括網路資源分配、優先權設定，以及切片之間的隔離。透過實作專案，學生將有機會實際設計、配置和管理地面站網路切片，以應對不同應用場景下的需求。此外，課程將探討服務品質保證技術，包括流量管理、延遲優化、及網路監控等方面。學生將學習如何測量、分析和改進地面站網路切片的服務品質，以確保滿足各種應用的需求。最後，課程也將討論地面站網路切片的未來趨勢，包括與新興技術的整合、標準化發展，以及面臨的挑戰。透過該課程，學生將具備地面站網路切片及服務品質保證的專業知識和實作技能。
description.en: This course introduces ground station network slicing, focusing on practical use and service quality. Students learn slicing concepts, resource allocation, and isolation through case studies and hands-on projects. The course also covers QoS techniques like traffic control and latency management, along with future trends and emerging technology integration.

name.zh: 地面站網路切片與服務品質保證
name.en: Network Slicing and Quality of Service Technology for Ground Stations

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器，進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 簡介 2. 低雜訊放大器 3. 混波器 4. 振盪器 5. 頻率合成器 6. 功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

notes: 希望不排六教，限 25 人，小教室

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用 Python 深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：? 車牌與門牌數字辨識？人臉辨識？1000 種影像分類？辨識 9000 種物件？自動駕駛模擬？嵌入式深度學習演算法？空虛，寂寞，覺得冷？讓深度學習來幫助你:? 遞迴式神經網路 (RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人？對抗生成網路 (GAN)：用 GAN 產生自己的夢中情人？深度強化學習 (DRL)：訓練 AI 跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

notes: 電子系、電資外生所和創新 AI 合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對 IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH) 教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP 服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

description.zh: 1. 嵌入式計算系統簡介 2. 即時系統核心之介紹與設計 3. 中央處理器 4. 嵌入式平台簡介 5. 硬體加速器 6. 驅動器的設計 7. 網路與分散式嵌入式系統 8. 嵌入式網路基礎架構系統設計與實作。
description.en: 1.An Introduction to Embedded Computing System 2.Introduction and Implementation to the Kernel of Real-time System 3.CPUs 4.Introducion to the Embedded Computing Platform 5.Hardware Acce;eratprs 6.Design of the Drivers 9.Networks and Distributed Embedded Systems 10.Embeddeed Web-based Design and Implementation.

description.zh: (1) 資料庫系統簡介，(2) 關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3) 資料表正規化，(4) 結構化查詢語言，(5) 交易管理與並時控制 (6) 分散式資料庫管理系統 (7) 物件導向式資料庫 (8) 電子商務中之資料庫 (9) 資料庫管理 (10) 網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能 “簡單” 理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: (1) 資料庫系統簡介，(2) 關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3) 資料表正規化，(4) 結構化查詢語言，(5) 交易管理與並時控制 (6) 分散式資料庫管理系統 (7) 物件導向式資料庫 (8) 電子商務中之資料庫 (9) 資料庫管理 (10) 網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 電腦數值控制技術的主要目標是實現機械系統的精密運動控制。本課程因此教授實現機械系統高精度運動所需的關鍵方法。涵蓋的主題包括：位置與軌跡控制的插補方法；應用於系統運動學與動力學的數值分析技術；以及精密運動控制系統的分析與設計。本課程結合實際應用案例以闡明這些方法。藉由本課程，學生將瞭解精密運動控制的設計與分析方法，並且能夠利用現有的軟體與硬體技術對機械系統進行精密控制。
description.en: The primary objective of computer numerical control technology is to enable precise motion control within mechanical systems. Accordingly, this course teaches key methodologies essential for achieving the high-precision motions of mechanical systems. Topics covered include: interpolation methods for position and trajectory control; numerical analysis techniques applied to system kinematics and dynamics; and the analysis and design of precision motion control systems. The course incorporates practical application cases to illustrate these methodologies. Through this course, students can understand the design and analysis methods of precision motion control, and be able to use existing software and hardware technologies to precisely control mechanical systems.

notes: 機電、製科合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 電腦軟體專利授予已歷經多年，然而不同於其它技術領域，於我國有一特定的審查標準。而近年來人工智慧技術飛猛進，雖奠基於電腦軟體，但其生成又牽涉到不同的概念與技術。人工智慧專利權的授予，如何適用電腦軟體發明的審查標準、或須另行適用一套新的標準，將是本課程之重點。本課程將提供學生相關近年來的專利審查趨勢與標準，以了解電腦軟體發明與人工智慧發明，其特定的專利審查標準，以及其間之異同。
description.en: For years, computer software has been eligible for patent protection, but it faces unique rules and standards compared to other technical fields. The rise of artificial intelligence (AI) has added new challenges, as AI technologies, while built on software, involve innovative concepts like machine learning and data-driven systems. This course explores how patents are granted for computer software and AI inventions, examining whether traditional software patent rules apply to AI or if new standards are needed. Students will gain a clear understanding of patent examination trends, learn the specific requirements for software and AI patents, and analyze the similarities and differences between them.

name.zh: 電腦軟體暨 AI 專利

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 資訊都市主義（informatical urbanism 或 informational urbanism）為一跨領域學科，旨在透過資訊環境與流程之輔助，推動政策、規劃、發展、策略行動、設計之都市與社區進程。本課程主要在協助學生，以都市與社區問題為基本導向，建立資訊環境與流程之規劃能力。授課主要涵蓋面向：1. 資訊與知識基礎設施 2. 經濟面向 3. 都市治理與公共行政 4. 都市空間之資訊化 5. 地點因子 6. 使用者行為 7. 特殊議題。
description.en: Informatical urbanism (or informational urbanism) is an interdisciplinary area of knowledge, and it mainly utilize the facilitation of informatical environments and procedures for the progression of policy, planning, development, strategic initiative, and design within cities and communities.During this course, student will acquire the planning capability of establish such applicable informatical environments and procedures, based upon explorations of urban and community issues.Main contents of this course: 1. Information and knowledge infrastructures, 2. Economic aspects, 3. Urban governance and administration, 4. Informaticalization of urban space, 5. Location factors, 6. User behavior, 7. Focus area of problem.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人 - 機 - 境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 排進修部教室，職互動所與職創新所合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期資金管理內容，將資金管理理論運用於實務金融市場、Blackjack 21 點。包括最佳化比例、賽馬賭局、損益量化、最大回檔風險、槓桿空間模型、固定分數與固定比例的運用。建議具有基礎程式撰寫能力、先修習過演算法交易、資金管理.. 等課程。
description.en: This course connects the money management content of the previous semester, and applies the theory to the practical financial market and Blackjack 21 points. The course includes optimal bidding fraction, horse racing, profit quantification maximum draw-down risk, leverage space models, and the use of fixed fractions and fixed ratios. It is recommended to have the ability to write basic programs, and have taken courses such as algorithmic trading and money management in advance.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容 (限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用 R 語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮 K 棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理… 等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授 XQ 程式交易軟體，撰寫 XS 程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

description.zh: 人工智慧物聯網課程將物聯網的感測器與感測網路、邊緣閘道、雲端服務與存取裝置，結合機器學習、深度學習及智慧分析技術，協同建構從端到端的智慧應用，涵蓋無人商店與智慧支付、遠距醫療與照護、智慧製造與智慧家庭等多元場景。本課程著重於人工智慧在裝置與服務設計中的關鍵角色，並透過實務案例與專題討論，培養學生規劃並開發創新智慧物聯網解決方案的能力。
description.en: The AIoT course integrates sensors and sensor networks, edge gateways, cloud services, and user access devices with machine learning, deep learning, and intelligent analytics to jointly build end-to-end smart applications. These applications cover a variety of domains such as Unmanned stores and smart payment, remote healthcare and telemedicine, smart manufacturing, and smart home systems. This course emphasizes the pivotal role of AI in device and service design, and through practical case studies and project discussions, aims to equip students with the ability to plan and develop innovative intelligent IoT solutions.

name.zh: 人工智慧物聯網與應用
name.en: Artificial Intelligence of Things and Applications

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生深入理解並掌握生成式人工智慧（Generative AI）的基本概念與實務應用。內容涵蓋 GenAI 介紹、提示工程（Prompt Engineering）、大規模語言模型（LLM）技術原理，以及設計思考專案，應用於金融或管理相關議題，並探討相關道德議題。課程強調實務應用，結合行銷理論和金融數據分析，邀請業界專家分享最新行業動態和實務經驗。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with a comprehensive understanding and mastery of the fundamental concepts and practical applications of Generative AI. The content covers an introduction to GenAI, Prompt Engineering, the technical principles of Large Language Models (LLM), and a design thinking project applied to finance or management-related issues, as well as discussions on relevant ethical topics. Emphasizing practical application, the course integrates marketing theories and financial data analysis, inviting industry experts to share the latest industry trends and practical insights.

notes: 資財四甲、資財所和創新資安合開

description.zh: 隨著金融交易、機器人應用等網路應用快速成長，系統需同時具備高擴展性、可靠性與安全性。為因應此趨勢，本課程培養學生具備從應用層到作業系統核心的程式開發實力，並強調 TCP/IP 通訊與系統架構整合。
description.en: With the rapid growth of internet services—such as financial transactions and robotic applications—modern systems must be scalable, reliable, and secure.
