This course addresses these needs by training students in programming skills from the application layer to the OS kernel, emphasizing TCP/IP networking and system architecture.

name.zh: 網路系統程式開發與安全

notes: 資財四甲、資財所和創新資安合開

description.zh: 課程著重於彩瓷陶瓷專業人才的系統化培力，探討彩繪陶瓷的多元工藝表現，並深入其歷史脈絡與發展體系中加以分析，研究其繪製技法、工序流程、內容形態及美學樣貌的演變。透過理論探討與實作並重的教學模式，培育新世代工藝人才，致力於傳統技藝的保存與創新。
description.en: This course focuses on the structured training of skilled professionals in colored porcelain craftsmanship. It examines diverse artistic expressions of painted ceramics within their historical and developmental contexts, analyzing the evolution of painting techniques, processes, content forms, and aesthetic paradigms. By integrating theoretical discourse with hands-on practice, the course aims to cultivate a new generation of artisans committed to the preservation and innovation of this traditional craft.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生開拓新的視野，蒐集、分析口述歷史資料並進行一份口述作品。課程將採實作練習與理論兼顧，全面分析整理台灣學界與非學界口述訪談之成果，檢視口述歷史訪談方法、口述紀錄出版品與各種延伸加值運用：紀錄片、電影、漫畫、文史書籍以及其他形式的智慧財產（IP）。
description.en: This course aims to broaden students' perspectives and equip them with the skills to collect and analyze oral history recordings, and produce an oral history project. It will combine practical exercises with theoretical learning and provide a comprehensive analysis of oral interviews conducted by both academic and non-academic institutions in Taiwan. The course will examine oral history interview methods, oral record transcriptions/recordings, and various extended applications of oral history materials, including documentaries, films, comics, literary and historical books, and other intellectual property (IP) projects.

description.zh: 1. 物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2. 視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL 語言的使用與資料庫連結 4. 智慧型演算法 5. 工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對 ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 綜科館 610，日車碩、智慧鐵道碩士學程和機電博合開

description.zh: 1. 永磁電機理論 2. 控制法則分析與模擬 3. 動態特性分析 4. 近代應用介紹
description.en: 1.Basic theory of operation 2. Control strategies analysis and simulation 3. Dynamic performance analysis 4. Introduction to recent applications of the PMSM.

name.zh: 永磁同步電動機之理論與控制
name.en: Theory and Control of Permanent-Magnet Synchronous Motor

description.zh: 本研究所課程從認知語用學視角，探知語言如何造成框架效應 (framing effects) 影響人們對事件的感知、詮釋與決策。課程內容含括概念隱喻	(conceptual metaphor)、詞彙選擇 (lexical selection)、文體結構 (discourse structure) 等核心語言學議題，並檢視這些語言要素如何影響個人與社會對概念的建構。語料分析涉及廣告、政治語言及日常溝通中的框架現象，探討語言如何被用來說服受眾、強化意識形態、塑造公眾輿論。課程關注框架背後的基本認知機制，包括心理模型 (mental	models) 與語言理解偏誤	(biases)。透過開放式討論、實證案例研究與話語分析實作，本課程將幫助學生深入理解語言與認知如何交互作用，進而影響人們對現實的建構與詮釋。本課程適合對語言學、認知科學、傳播學及媒體 (廣告) 語言分析感興趣的同學。
description.en: Cognitive Pragmatics in Media Communication is a graduate course that examines how language shapes perception, interpretation, and decision-making through framing effects, drawing insights from cognitive pragmatics. It explores how linguistic choices—such as conceptual metaphor, lexical selection, and discourse structure—influence how individuals and societies construct meaning. Students will analyze framing effects in advertising, political discourse, media narratives, and everyday communication, investigating how language is used to persuade, reinforce ideologies, and shape public opinion. The course also considers the cognitive mechanisms behind framing, including mental models and biases in language comprehension. Through open discussions, empirical case studies, and hands-on discourse analysis, students will develop a deeper understanding of how language interacts with cognition to frame reality. This course is ideal for students in linguistics, cognitive science, communicatio

description.zh: 1. 人工智慧簡介 2. 陳述式邏輯 3. 確定模型之學習 4. 非確定型知識之表示 5. 貝式網路 6. 機率式模型之參數學習 7. 機率式模型之結構學習 8. 非監督式學習 9. 基因法則 10. 基因規劃法 11. 粒子群最佳化演算法
description.en: 1. Introduction to Artificial Intelligence2. Propositional Logic3. Learning of Deterministic Models4. Representation of Uncertain Knowledge5. Bayesian Networks6. Parameter Learning of Probabilistic Models7. Structure Learning of Probabilistic Models8. Unsupervised Learning 9. Genetic Algorithm10. Genetic Programming11. Particle Swarm Optimization

notes: 電機所、電資外生和創新 AI 合開

description.zh: 本課程以 R 語言介紹資料科學和數據可視化。本課程注重於資料科學的實際應用，學生將學習到如何整理、探索、轉換和數據可視化。 學生以作業練習和獨立項目來獲得實數據科學的基本技能。
description.en: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X 光電子光譜儀 (XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀 (LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀 (STM)、表面振動光譜儀 (surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法 (TPD) 及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2) 細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3) 基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4) 實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

notes: 車輛所、職車輛所和鐵道碩士學程合開

description.zh: 臺灣島位於西太平洋，就板塊構造運動而言，臺灣上新－更新世的造山運動代表歐亞大陸板塊的前緣和其東側以西北方向前進的菲律賓海洋板塊間的衝撞聚合運動。東臺灣花蓮和臺東間的縱谷，已被認為是兩個板塊間的縫合帶和板塊聚合的邊緣。在臺灣的北部，大陸和島弧的碰撞型式可能是菲律賓海板塊向北傾沒到位於歐亞大陸板塊上的琉球島弧系統之下。但是向南沿東臺灣縱谷，在北緯二十四度以南，板塊隱沒方向發生改變，歐亞大陸板塊於此向東隱沒進入菲律賓海板塊之下。此一特殊的板塊背景造就了臺灣多樣的地質現象・本課程之內容主要探討台灣地區 (包括海域) 自中生代至現代的大地構造演變及其地體構造運動、盆地演化、岩石圈的結構及性質、造山運動機制等各種地質現象。希望能藉由瞭解臺灣區域地質，從而作為探討臺灣地質工程與環境領域之基礎・
description.en: Taiwan island is located on the weastern Pacific Ocean. The plate tectonic setting of Taiwan is the convergence and collision between the western Eurasian plate and the easterly impinging Philippine Sea plate on the Pli-Pleistocene. The Longitudinal Valley between Hualien and Taitung in eastern Taiwan has been recognized as the suture zone between these two plates. In northeastern Taiwan, convergence is marked by northward subduction of the Philippine Sea plate beneath the Ryukyu Arc System on the Eurasian plate along the Ryukyu Trench. The subduction polarity changes at 24°N near Hualien in eastern Taiwan. There plate convergence is marked by eastward subduction of the Eurasian plate underneath the Luzon Arc System on the Philippine Sea plate along the Eastern Longitudinal Valley. This distinctive tectonic setting bas brought up various special geologic phenomena on Taiwan The course is aimed at graduate students in the geological engineering, who wish to gain an insight into the s

name.en: Special Topics on Regional Geology of Taiwan

description.zh: 「賽局行為與文化策略」旨在針對賽局中的行為決策與其文化策略進行探討，並以課程講授與實際操作交替進行。學習者將了解賽局的構成要素、它的性質、各種模型，和人際互動時的應對之方。除了傳統議題如「納許均衡」、「囚徒困境」、「優勢策略」之外，我們還會探討「文化策略」、「無限賽局」、「企業策略」，與「分餅」等時興議題。
description.en: The course investigates behavioral decision making in terms of the perspective of game theory and cultural strategies, and is conducted by discussion and practice activities. The participants shall understand the constituent elements, essence, models of games, along with a variety of strategies adopted between individuals in real life. In addition to traditional issues such as “Nash equilibrium,” “prisoner’s dilemma,” “dominant strategy,” etc., the course will also deal with trendy topics and ideas such as “cultural strategy,” “split the pie,” “the infinite game,” “business strategy” and the like.

name.en: Behavioral decision in games & cultural strategy

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: C 語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導 C 程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation 應用等，除了於 PC 上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有 case study 來輔助教學以及了解 C 語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬 CPU 排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

name.zh: 進階 C 語言實務

description.zh: 1. 光感測技術概論、2. 光感測元件、3. 光源與光偵測元件、4. 光感測系統設計與架構、5. 光感測訊號處理技術、6. 光感測訊號分類與辨識、7. 光感測系統校正與穩定性提升、8. 光感測應用案例分析。
description.en: 1. Introduction to Optical Sensing Technologies2. Optical Sensing Devices3. Light Sources and Photodetectors4. Design and Architecture of Optical Sensing Systems5. Signal Processing Techniques for Optical Sensing6. Classification and Recognition of Optical Sensing Signals7. Calibration and Stability Enhancement of Optical Sensing Systems  8. Case Studies in Optical Sensing Applications

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (關聯群 7)

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理和經營策略實務

description.zh: 玄奘之路商學院戈壁挑戰賽緣起於 2006 年，秉承「玄奘之路」精神，倡導「理想、行動、堅持、超越」之理念，通過浸入式的身心體驗和團隊協作來達成個人心靈突破，並鼓勵參賽戈友相互扶持、共同進退，弘揚團隊合作、永不放棄的正向能量。
description.en: The Business Schools Xuanzang Road Gobi Challenge originated in 2006.This event adheres to the spirit of "Xuan Zang Road", advocates the concept of "idealism, action, persistence, and transcendence" to achieve personal spiritual breakthrough through immersive physical and mental experience and teamwork; Gobi challenge also promotes teamwork by encouraging all participants to support each other, to advance and retreat together, and be positive, never give up!

name.zh: 運動與休閒管理 - 戈壁挑戰賽
name.en: Sports and Leisure activity Management -Gobi Challenge

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討，其中包含: 1. 電子化企業概論 2. 經營模式 3. 企業再造 4. 企業資源管理 5. 中小企業電子化 6. 商業電子化 7. 供應鏈管理 8. 需求鏈管理 9. 協同預測管理 10. 個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain manage-ment9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 「媒介與環境」作為近年逐漸開始發展的學術領域，其論述原點通常可追溯自 1960 年代，藉由 Marshall McLuhan 對於媒體（Media）與媒介（Medium）的哲學性討論與實驗性創作，首先打開後世電影與媒體學者對於相關學術主題的探討。但這個概念卻要一直到近年，伴隨著科技的進步與媒體研究的發展，例如 Anne Friedberg 針對當代可以出現在各種人造與非人造環境中的螢幕（Screen）的分析，才被廣泛地作為媒介（Medium）與環境（environment）研究仰賴的分析架構，並奠定後續此學術領域的發展方向。此課程將於都市文化研究的固有知識基礎上，引入媒介與環境領域的新興論述，探究各類「觸媒」對於當代文化發展與都市設計的影響。探討子題包含有數位全球化、文創嘉年華、智慧城市、網飛經濟等當前重要都市發展議題，並透過課堂討論、方法學作業，與期末短論培養學生連結理論與實務、深度反思、和獨立探索新興學術領域的能力。
description.en: The scholarship of “Medium and Environment” was first explored by Marshall McLuhan in the 1960s with a series of academic and practical works. However, this field was not gaining much attention until the past decade when technology has brought novel challenges and scholars in film and media have been shifting their focuses to this aspect. Because of these, the studies of medium and environment has recently been an emerging field that intends to examine the phenomena intertwining the two aspects through interdisciplinary approach. Based on this background, this course will introduce cutting-edge scholarships of medium and environment studies to the traditional field of urban cultural studies, pursuing effective perspectives to unfold today’s critical urban issues, for instance globalization in digital era, carnival and creative industry, smart city, Netflix economy (Harvey, 2020), and so forth. Student will be expected to learn how to bridge theories and practices, to develop critica

name.zh: 文化觸媒介入都市設計
name.en: Cultural Medium Intervening into Urban Design

description.zh: 課程旨在讓學生了解 X 射線繞射 (XRD) 與 X 射線吸收光譜 (XAS) 的基本理論與實際應用。這兩項 X 光技術已經成為近代材料結構鑑定的重要方法。在 XRD 部分，學生將學到分析粉末繞射圖數據，並計算晶體結構參數，如晶面間距 (d-spacing) 與結構因子 (Structure factor)，以及結構精算 (refinement)。X 光近吸收邊緣光譜 (XANES) 與延伸 X 光吸收精細結構 (EXAFS) 將會在 X 射線吸收光譜中介紹。此外課程中，將教導學生使用 Matlab 與相關費軟體進行數據處理與結構解析，藉此提升學生理論與實驗數據分析能力。
description.en: This course is to teach students the fundamental theory and applications of x-ray diffraction (XRD) and x-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS). These two x-ray techniques have become very important methods for structural characterizations on modern science. In the XRD part, students will learn how to analyze the powder XRD pattern from d-spacing, structure factor and Rietveld refinement. The illustration of XAS will include x-ray absorption near edge spectroscopy (XANES) and extended x-ray absorption fine structure (EXAFS). Meanwhile, the Matlab and relative free softwares will be used to do data analysis. Hope such combinations will enhance the capability of data analysis on students.

name.zh: 現代 X 光技術與材料分析
name.en: Modern X-Ray Techniques and Materials Analysis

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 本課程大量的個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法，讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解，課程內容將以國內與國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括策略管理，行銷管理，組織領導，科技管理等。課程將採用參與式個案為教學方法，個案來源為哈佛商學院以及光華管理個案資料庫。
description.en: This course uses Harvard style case method to enhance MBA students' business concepts and theories. The topics include: strategy management, marketing management, leadership, and technology management. The case materials will be adapted from Harvard Business School and KMCC center.

description.zh: 本課程期望學生能夠能有獨立思考的能力，對產品建構出合理的實驗設計架構，透過採集人的生理與心理數據對產品進行人因工程評估，最後將實驗發現應用於產品的重新設計上，讓產品能夠更符合使用者的需求與認知。
description.en: In this course, students are expected to demonstrate independent thinking, develop a reasonable experimental design, conduct ergonomics evaluations on products by collecting both physiological and psychological data, and ultimately apply the findings to redesign products. This ensures that the products align more effectively with the needs and perceptions of users.

name.en: Ergonomics evaluation and redesign in products

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含：創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 825 / 經管所和 IMBA 合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹人工智慧深度學習之基礎原理與基本應用，以及智慧型模糊控制之理論與控制器實務。本課程結合理論與實作，讓學生能夠瞭解人工智慧深度學習，深入理解智慧型控制，並進而運用這些技術。課程將介紹人工智慧與深度學習基礎以及實作應用，接著深入介紹模糊邏輯與模糊控制系統的設計與應用。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental principles and basic applications of Artificial Intelligence (AI) Deep Learning (DL), and the theory and practical implementation of intelligent fuzzy control. The course combines theory and practice to make students understand AI DL, intelligent control, and their applications.

name.zh: AI 深度學習應用與智慧型控制
name.en: AI Deep Learning Application and Intelligent Control

description.zh: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
description.en: This is a graduate seminar-based course that provides an overview of many algorithms in machine learning and its applications. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at current research topics in machine learning covering Concept Learning, Decision Tree, Graphical Model, Neural Network, Bayesian Network, Instance-based Learning, and Support Vector Machine. Through the course, students can have the basic ideas and intuition behind modern machine learning methods.

description.zh: 本課程聚焦於具應用潛力之前瞻光電材料之性質、製程技術，以及其於光學檢測與雷射應用中的角色。涵蓋之材料類型包括光電半導體材料（如 III-V 族、鈣鈦礦）、液晶、有機高分子材料、奈米材料（如金屬奈米粒子）與二維材料（如石墨烯、MXene 等）。學生將深入了解這些材料的光電特性，並探討其在雷射、感測器、顯示器、可撓式電子與生醫檢測元件等領域的實際應用。課程內容亦介紹多種光學與雷射相關的量測技術，包括光學吸收、螢光、光致發光（PL）、拉曼光譜、表面增強拉曼散射（SERS），以及雷射激發之光學檢測方法。透過應用導向的案例分析與實作設計，強化學生於材料、雷射與光學系統整合方面的跨領域實務能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the properties and fabrication techniques of advanced optoelectronic materials, as well as their roles in optical detection and laser-related applications.Covered material categories include optoelectronic semiconductors,liquid crystals, organic polymers and biocompatible materials.Students will gain in-depth understanding of the optoelectronic properties of these materials and explore their practical applications in laser systems,sensors,displays,flexible electronics,and biomedical diagnostic devices.The course also introduces a variety of optical and laser-based characterization techniques,including optical absorption,fluorescence,photoluminescence,Raman spectroscopy,surface-enhanced Raman scattering,and laser-excited optical detection methods.Through application-oriented case studies and hands-on project design, students will develop interdisciplinary practical skills in integrating materials, lasers, and optical systems.

name.zh: 前瞻材料光學量測與應用
name.en: Optical Measurement and Applications of Emerging Materials

description.zh: 1. 有機電子元件導論。2. 材料導論與晶體結構。3. 有機半導體光學特性。4. 有機半導體電學特性。5. 有機發光二極體。6. 有機太陽能電池與光偵測器。7. 有機場效電晶體。8. 有機半導體製程
description.en: 1.	Introduction to Organic Electronic Devices2.	Introduction to Materials and Crystal Structures3.	Optical Properties of Organic Semiconductors4.	Electrical Properties of Organic Semiconductors5.	Organic Light-Emitting Diodes (OLEDs)6.	Organic Solar Cells and Photodetectors7.	Organic Field-Effect Transistors (OFETs)8.	Organic Semiconductor Fabrication Processes

name.zh: 有機半導體材料與元件導論
name.en: Introduction to Organic Semiconductor Materials and Devices

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋太空系統工程的進階課題，包括當前研究和新興技術。本課程將深入理解太空系統的設計、開發、測試和實施，著重於子系統的整合和系統性能的最佳化。主題將包括先進的材料和結構、推進系統、航電系統、控制系統、人因因素等。學生將通過案例研究、設計專案和模擬實例進行學習。
description.en: This course covers advanced topics in space systems engineering, including current research and emerging technologies. The course will provide an in-depth understanding of the design, development, testing, and implementation of space systems, with a focus on the integration of subsystems and the optimization of system performance. Topics will include advanced materials and structures, propulsion systems, avionics, control systems, human factors, and more. Students will gain hands-on experience through case studies, design projects, and simulation exercises.

notes: 光電系、電子系和太空所合開

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解市場定位與策略跟科技產品發展與運用的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前科技產品發展的相關課題，以及整體環境的概述，讓同學對於產業或企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is closely related to the field of technology product development and application through understanding market positioning and strategies. The course content mainly provides students with a basic understanding of the market positioning and strategies of technology products in industries or enterprises through the current topics related to the development of technology products and an overview of the overall environment, and provides students with different perspectives on technology products, market positioning, and management strategies. Understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Technology Products Market Positioning and Strategy

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。封裝技術論及相關技術方法，如施力、軟焊、或熔接等用來將兩個或多個微電子、微機械、微光學或其他相關元件結合的技術原理及製程。內容也涉及被封裝的元件的材料及封裝可靠度有關的特性如力學、熱傳、電磁干擾等。案例包括黏晶、打線、覆晶、黏著技術及軟焊技術等。
description.en: The lecture describes packaging technology as a summary of those technological methods, which use joining of two or more electronic, micro-mechanic micro-optic or other components like this by force, soldering or welding processes. Besides the presentation of these processes, the parts, i.e. thin film circuit elements, thick film components, including their material and technology relevant properties such as mechanical, heat transfer, electromagnetic interference,  which influence the packaging reliability are described. Examples such as die bonding, wire bonding, flip-chip bonding adhesive technology and soldering technology are chosen to show joining technology for semiconductor, MEM components, hybrid CKTs, packages and modules.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意熱傳基本方程式，熱對流之解法，亂流熱對流，流場預測，熱傳預測．
description.en: Basic Equations of Heat Transfer , Laminar Convective Heat Transfer ( Internal and External ) , Solutions , Turbulent Convective Heat Transfer , Flow Prediction , Heat Transfer Prediction .

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬；主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 語言實務應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Language Studies

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。包含數值方法基本觀念，數值方法之誤差及穩定性，非線性代數方程式之數值解法，聯立代數方程式之數值解法，矩陣特徵值求法，非線性聯立方程式之數值解法，多項式插值法及曲線嵌合，數值微分與積分，常微分方程式及偏微分方程式之數值解法 。
description.en: Introduction of using numerical methods to solve practical engineering problems. Topics include Solving nonlinear equations, Solving sets of equations, interpolation and curve fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, numerical solution of ODE and PDE.

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 綜科館 610，與日車碩合開，英文授課

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬；主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 語言實務應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Language Studies

description.zh: 本課程將引領學生將閱讀及寫作技巧運用到課堂中的文字研究。學生可藉本課程獨力完成知識性創意、評論式及論證式的文體，並可藉此學習其中批判式閱讀及思考的應用及價值。
description.en: In this course students will learn to apply their reading and writing skills to the study of texts from a variety of sources. The course is geared to teach the student the use and value of critical reading and thinking in the production their own independent, intellectually creative, and critically structured and argued essays intended for an educated audience.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 文學文化應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究 ，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis.

description.zh: 本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
description.en: This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.

notes: 建都所與建築四合開，設計館 751 授課

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 碩二 / 甲乙組 / 土木 500

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: Seminar Special subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 碩一 / 甲乙組 / 土木 500

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 碩二 / 丙丁戊組 / 土木 500

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: Seminar Special subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

notes: 碩一 / 丙丁戊組 / 土木 500

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究 (一)

description.zh: 防疫型建築專題課程主要針對 COVID-19 後疫情時代，防疫理念如何融入建築領域，結合病毒控制技術理論和防制病毒擴散的設計方法，分析國內外建築案例，探討病毒特性、學習抗病毒材料與設備、壓差控制技術、通風換氣效益、行政管理措施等相關技術應用，系統性地探討如何在建築設計、材料選擇與建築全生命周期管理中，實現日常生活建築如何建構防疫應急的關聯措施，並運用環境評估工具量化建築的防疫效益，引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出因應疫情的創新設計思維，兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，以及建築設計的防疫解決方案，最終培養其在人居健康環境下的永續建築設計能力。
description.en: The specialized course on epidemic prevention architecture focuses on how to incorporate epidemic prevention concepts into the field of architecture in the post-COVID-19 era. It integrates theories of virus control technologies with design strategies aimed at preventing the spread of infectious diseases. Through the analysis of domestic and international architectural cases, the course examines the characteristics of viruses and explores the application of antiviral materials and equipment, pressure differential control, ventilation efficiency, and administrative management measures.It systematically investigates how epidemic prevention and emergency response strategies can be embedded into architectural design, material selection, and the entire building lifecycle. Students will learn to utilize environmental assessment tools to quantify the epidemic prevention performance of buildings, and will be guided to engage in interdisciplinary learning. The course encourages the development o

name.en: Special Topics on Epidemic Prevention  Architecture

description.zh: 本課程是在講述建築生命週期碳足跡的評估法。藉由標準化、透明化的建築資訊，一步步剖析建築生命週期各階段對環境的影響。本課程得評估整棟建築生命週期的碳足跡、甚進一步提出減碳熱點，了解建築物的節碳潛力所在。
description.en: This course evaluates the carbon footprint of a building's life cycle. Through standardized and transparent building information, the impact of various stages of the building life cycle on the environment is analyzed step by step. This course not only evaluates the carbon footprint of the entire building life cycle but also further identifies carbon hotspots and provides carbon reduction strategies, hence understanding carbon savings potential of buildings.

name.en: THE EVALUATION FOR BUILDING'S CARBON FOOTPRINT

description.zh: 總課程目標：在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。課程目標：解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環境。課程概要：利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments.The manipulation of different design topics, the disciples learn to understand the relational relationship between theory and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation which includes design result and a report of the process of the ascertainment will be required for evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程包含 2 大部份，服務與創新管理及智慧財產權與科技法律。 服務與創新管理旨在了解服務與創新管理之意義、方法與現況，內容包含服務之本質、創新之意義、服務與創新管理之方法、科技之應用、服務與創新管理現況介紹等。智慧財產權與科技法律旨在了解如何以智慧財產權來保護科技研發成果，內容包括智慧財產權法規介紹與專利運用策略實務。
description.en: This course contains two major parts, service and innovation management and Intellectual property and technology law. Service and innovation management is to demonstrate the definition, the methodologies and the state of the art of service and innovation management, including the nature of service, innovation, the tools for service and innovation management, technology application and current development of service and innovation management. Intellectual property and technology law is to demonstrate understanding how to protect R & D achievements with intellectual property rights. This course includes intellectual property laws and patent strategies practice.

name.en: Introduction to Services and Technology Management

description.zh: 1. 基本介紹及概念 2. 高等電磁理論 3. 有效求解方法 4. 平面波方程 5. 園柱波方程
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts2.Advance Theorems3.Useful Techniques4.Plane Wave Function5.Cylindrical Wave Function

description.zh: 1. 基礎傳輸線理論 2. 耦合 3. 非理想的傳輸線效應 4. 構裝、連接器與穿接腳 5. 電源供應系統 6. 電子電路的模擬

description.zh: 本課程致力於深入研究各種低軌道衛星地面站系統的複雜結構和相關元素。課程首先介紹低軌道衛星地面站系統的基本概念，包括其在衛星通訊中的角色和功能。學生將深入了解地面站系統在支援低軌道衛星通訊方面的重要性。接著，課程將詳細介紹不同類型的地面站，如海事衛星、GEO/LEO 地面站以及固定式 / 移動式地面站。學生將學會分析這些地面站的特點、應用場景，以及相應的技術要求。課程的內容還包括天線次系統，涵蓋天線的種類、原理和性能特點。同時，課程將探討 LOC（地面中控系統）的功能和重要性，使學生瞭解地面站系統的集中控制和管理。接下來，學生也將深入研究資料介接網路，包括資料的傳輸方式、協定和安全性，以確保地面站系統的有效運作。最後，課程將關注其他支援系統，包括電源、控制和機構等，使學生全面理解地面站系統的整體結構和運作機制。透過實例分析，學生將獲得地面站系統架構解析的實際能力。
description.en: This course introduces the structure and key components of Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite ground station systems. Students will learn the fundamental roles and functions of these systems in satellite communication, gaining insights into various types such as maritime, GEO/LEO, and fixed/mobile ground stations. The course examines their application scenarios and technical requirements, and explores antenna subsystems, including their types and performance. It also covers the Local Operations Center (LOC), highlighting centralized control and system management. Additionally, data interface networks are discussed, with emphasis on transmission methods, protocols, and security. Supporting systems like power and control mechanisms are introduced. Practical case studies help students understand and analyze ground station architectures.

description.zh: 1.	衛星軌道與軌跡 2.	數位通訊，多工技術 3.	衛星通訊 - 衛星本體 4.	衛星通訊 - 地面站 5.	衛星鏈路分析與設計 6.	衛星通訊應用
description.en: 1.	Satellite Orbits and Trajectories2.	Digital Communications, Multiple Access3.	Communication Satellite - Space segment4.	Communication Satellite - Earth segment5.	Satellite Link Analysis and Design6.	Applications of Satellite Communication

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含：生醫產業簡介，新世紀人類基因體大計畫，微生物工程新應用，新型蛋白質藥劑之開發，分子醫療診斷之革新，生醫產業之電腦新科技，遠距醫療服務新模式，創新健康管理與保險制度的創新，生醫產業與科技法律，生醫產業與社會倫理，幹細胞新產業，組織再生新產業，超級老鼠的誕生，美美的生醫美容，抗癌症研究之新科技，抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of biomedical industries in the new millennium. The course covers areas such as human genome project, biotechnology application with microbes, new protein drug, innovative medical technology, computation biology in biomedical industries, new business models in telemedicine, health care management and innovative insurance trends, technology laws in biomedical industries, social responsibility and biomedical industries, stem cell technology, new industries from tissue engineering and so on. The grading method of the course is based on the oral and written reports.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 校務研究（Institutional Research，以下簡稱 IR）可說是針對校務所進行的各項研究，透過資料蒐集、分析、報告，以及教職員行動，以促進高等教育機構的運作與決定。同時 IR 的發展和大學評鑑的發展脈絡息息相關，最終的目的就是要提升學校辦學品質，促進學校良善發展。本課程主要希望加強同學對 IR 的了解及發展實作能力。
description.en: Institutional research is a broad category of work done at schools, colleges and universities to inform campus decision-making and planning in areas such as admissions, financial aid, curriculum, enrollment management, staffing, student life, finance, facilities, athletics, and alumni relations. Its mission is to foster a culture of evidence by facilitating the management, analysis, and reporting of institutional data and information in support of planning and decision-making. This curriculum is expected to provide all students understand the theory and practice of IR.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

description.zh: 課程將以體驗式教學訓練，提升學員表達技巧、舞台技巧、臨場反應。本課程主要目的在教授學生以設計思考思維與策略，運用主題式課程實戰小組簡報及個人簡報，快速釐清簡報製作及表達過程中重點，提升修課學員個人簡報製作能力及表達能力，幫助學生在未來創業及就業上以出色之個人簡報能力獲得面試者及投資者的青睞，領先於起跑點取得優勢。
description.en: The course will use experiential teaching training to improve students' expression skills, stage skills, and on-the-spot reactions. The main purpose of this course is to teach students establishing design thinking strategies. During the course practice group presentations and personal presentations training students to quickly clarify the key points in the process of presentation production and presentation, to improve the students' personal presentation production and presentation skills. Furthermore, assist students' entrepreneurship and employment in the future. Students who finished this course will be favored by interviewers and investors with his excellent personal presentation skills. And he will gain an advantage over the starting point.

name.zh: 企業最愛：高質感簡報溝通力
name.en: Corporate's Favorite: High-quality Communication and Presentation Ability
